subSections.text: * {{ja-r|青は藍より出でて藍より青し|あお は あい より いでて あい より あおし}}

subSections.title: Derived terms
Etymology 3
subSections.text:
{{ja-kanjitab|しい|yomi=o}}
{{unk|ja|sort=しい}}. The reading might be an obscure term from {{etyl|ojp|-}} or dialect. The use of the character {{lang|ja|青}} arises from its {{m|ja|宋音|tr=sōon||Song-dynasty pronunciation}}.<ref name="KDJ">{{R:Kokugo Dai Jiten}}</ref>

subSections.title: Noun
